metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15503 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
LibRaw before 0.20-RC1 lacks a thumbnail size range check. This affectsdecoders/unpack_thumb.cpp, postprocessing/mem_image.cpp, andutils/thumb_utils.cpp. For example,malloc(sizeof(libraw_processed_image_t)+T.tlength) occurs withoutvalidating T.tlength.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-15503` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.8-1ubuntu0.4
libraw16 - 0.18.8-1ubuntu0.4
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
